pages.text: The Dark Altar is the centerpiece of most Rituals. Before anything, the Altar must be placed above a $(l:intro/cursed_cage)Cursed Cage$(), and the Cage must have Soul Energy for the Altar to function.

By using a Dark Altar, you may craft a certain item or summon a creature depending on the blocks and items surrounding the Altar. Unlike other schools of magic, these blocks do $(l)not$() need to be arranged in a certain order for the ritual to function. What matters is the certain amount of certain blocks are $(l)within$() the Altar's $(l)16 block radius.$() Shift right-clicking on the Dark Altar with an empty hand will show the range of affect, doing it again will hide it.

To begin the ritual, you must filled the pedestals first with the required items $(l)before$() placing the Altar's item. When the ritual is ongoing, the Altar will siphon Soul Energy from the Cage, so you best make sure it has enough of it before enacting a Ritual! The Pedestals can be used for decoration.
